experiences.title: Software Developer
desc: Developed and maintained responsive and user-friendly front-end interfaces using ReactJS, Bootstrap managed state using Redux and Context API
Designed and built client-side routing using react-router-dom
Developed back-end staff in Node.js and Express.js, facilitating data storage and retrieval using MongoDB and Mongoose.
Used in development: Node, Express, Mongoose, JWT, REST APIs, CORS, Helmet, Joi, Multer, Javascript, React, Bootstrap, CSS, JSX,  Git and Github

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
desc: Collaborated on the front end using ReactJS, HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap to create responsive and user-friendly web interfaces
Assisted in testing, to ensure application reliability.
Engaged in code reviews to learn and maintain code quality standards.
